author: Cat Clifford
title: COVID-19 pandemic proves the need for 'social robots,' 'robot avatars' and more, say experts
description: The COVID-19 pandemic may be the catalyst that inspires a slew of robotics innovation, from social robots to robot avatars that go to conferences in our stead, according to a public letter from 13 robotics experts from China to Switzerland to Italy to the USA.
content:
One of the consequences of people being told to stay home to slow the spread of coronavirus is loneliness. And a collection of 13 robotics experts from around the world have a suggestion for how to solve that: a robot pal. 
The innovation is just one of many… [+4816 chars]
